projectGridLines.title: Project 1  Title: Business Development Associate (60% of the work),  Project 2  Title: Marketing Campaigns (40% of the work)
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1

Title: Business Development Associate (60% of the work)

Description: The Business Development Intern will be responsible for managing and growing client accounts, and building strong relationships with customers. They will engage in sales prospecting, lead generation, and conversion, as well as maintaining a high level of product knowledge. The intern will also work on making strategies to expand to the international market.


Skill sets: LinkedIn, Google Sheets, Secondary Research, Database analysis, Lead generation


Traits expectation: Sales and Business Development skills

Strong negotiation and persuasion skills

Excellent communication and presentation skills

Ability to build and maintain relationships with customers



Expected learning: 

Specific courses required for project execution:
